results.name: a(n) = exp(1/2) * Sum_{k>=0} (2*k + 1)^n / ((-2)^k * k!).
mathematica: nmax = 24; CoefficientList[Series[1/(1 - x) Sum[(-x/(1 - x))^k/Product[(1 - 2 j x/(1 - x)), {j, 1, k}], {k, 0, nmax}], {x, 0, nmax}], x]
nmax = 24; CoefficientList[Series[Exp[x + (1 - Exp[2 x])/2], {x, 0, nmax}], x] Range[0, nmax]!
Table[Sum[Binomial[n, k] * 2^k * BellB[k, -1/2], {k, 0, n}], {n, 0, 24}] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Apr 18 2020 *)
results.author: _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Apr 18 2020
